channel.title: Simulation-Based Inference on Jan Teusen (né Boelts)
channel.description: Recent content in Simulation-Based Inference on Jan Teusen (né Boelts)

item.title: Simulation-Based Inference: A Practical Guide
item.description: A practical guide for practitioners aiming to apply simulation-based inference methods for scientific discovery

item.title: Pyro Meets SBI: Unlocking Hierarchical Bayesian Inference for Complex Simulators
item.description: Bridging simulation-based inference and probabilistic programming for hierarchical Bayesian analysis of complex simulators

item.title: Beyond Likelihoods: Bayesian Parameter Inference for Black-Box Simulators with sbi
item.description: Hands-on tutorial on simulation-based inference for parameter estimation in complex simulators

item.title: sbi reloaded: A toolkit for simulation-based inference workflows
item.description: A comprehensive toolkit for simulation-based inference workflows, providing researchers with flexible and efficient tools for Bayesian inference

item.title: Dissecting origins of wiring specificity in dense cortical connectomes
item.description: Analyzing the origins of synaptic specificity in dense reconstructions of cortical circuits

item.title: Simulated Data is All You Need: Bayesian Parameter Inference for Scientific Simulators with SBI
item.description: A EuroSciPy 2024 talk on using simulation-based inference (SBI) for Bayesian parameter estimation in scientific models, utilizing the sbi library.

item.title: Mind the Gap: Methods and Applicability of Simulation-Based Inference
item.description: Research talk on bridging the gap between SBI methods and practical applications

item.title: Simulation-based inference for efficient identification of generative models in connectomics
item.description: Using simulation-based inference to identify synaptic connectivity rules in anatomically realistic cortical connectomes

item.title: Simulation-Based Inference for Computational Neuroscience
item.description: Invited talk on applying simulation-based inference to neuroscience models

item.title: GATSBI: Generative Adversarial Training for Simulation-Based Inference
item.description: A new approach to simulation-based inference using generative adversarial networks for improved sample efficiency

item.title: SBI: Simulation-Based Inference Toolkit
item.description: SBI: A Python package for simulation-based inference

item.title: Benchmarking Simulation-Based Inference
item.description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating simulation-based inference methods across diverse tasks

item.title: sbi: A toolkit for simulation-based inference
item.description: The original sbi package paper introducing a unified Python toolkit for simulation-based inference
